nicer_skies.menu.compatibility_warning:
§lNote:§r 

Disable "Twinkle Stars" for compatibility with other mods.
(e.g. Custom Stars)
nicer_skies.option.custom_lightmap.toolt: Tweak the light color with slightly warmer block lights and darker, bluer nights.
nicer_skies.option.nebula_scale.tooltip: Determines the size of the nebulas. Higher values will make nebulas appear smaller, and vice-versa.
nicer_skies.option.nebula_transparency.t: Determines the transparency of the nebulas. Higher values will make nebulas appear more visible.
nicer_skies.option.nebula_amount.tooltip: Determines how much of the sky is covered by nebulas. Lower values will create few, small, sparse nebulas.
nicer_skies.option.background_strength.t: Determines the strength of the rainbow background. Higher values will make the background appear brighter.
nicer_skies.option.render_during_day.too: Determines whether nebulas are rendered during the day. If disabled, nebulas will only be rendered at night, fading in and out.
